short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a custom URL on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to set a custom URL that will be used whenever you open new tab.

I want to be able to set a chrome new tab to a specific URL for work but don't want to use some random extension.

Goal is to have a super simple extension that security won't get mad about.

Source:
https://github.com/rpingx/chrome-new-tab-setting
